entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon.
